description: This header file defines the MoCAHAL class which acts as a stub interface for MoCA Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) in a testing framework. It includes method declarations for various MoCA HAL operations such as configuration, statistics retrieval, and device management, with binding to JSON-RPC procedures. It also includes class inheritance and method declarations for initialization and cleanup processes.

classes.name: MoCAHAL
classes.description: A class representing the MoCA HAL stub, inheriting from RDKTestStubInterface and AbstractServer, providing methods for MoCA HAL operations and JSON-RPC method bindings.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the MoCAHAL testing module with a given version string.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Performs cleanup for the MoCAHAL testing module for a given version.

methods.name: testmodulepre_requisites
methods.description: Checks pre-requisites before testing the module.

methods.name: testmodulepost_requisites
methods.description: Checks post-requisites after testing the module.

methods.name: MoCAHAL_GetIfConfig
methods.description: Stub function to get interface configuration parameters.

methods.description: Stub function to set interface configuration parameters.

methods.description: Stub function to retrieve static info about the interface.

methods.name: MoCAHAL_IfGetDynamicInfo
methods.description: Stub function to retrieve dynamic info about the interface.

methods.description: Stub function to get statistics related to the interface.
